details.title: Results of high latitude trials of modern marine compasses
details.abstract: This paper presents the results of the trials of master compasses: Vega-M, Geus-M, Meridian, and satellite compass MRK-11 received in the course of three cruises to the North Pole of the atomic ice-breaker "Yamal" in the summer of 2003. Methods of gyrocompass accuracy evaluation and some practical recommendations useful for operation in polar waters are given.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
